```{r}
library(ggradar)
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
```


```{r}
mtcars_radar <- mtcars %>% 
  as_tibble(rownames = "group") %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(-group), rescale) %>% 
  tail(4) %>% 
  select(1:10)
```

```{r}
ggradar(mtcars_radar)

```

```{r}
peng = palmerpenguins::penguins

peng %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(-group), rescale) %>% 
  tail(4)
```

```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  as_tibble(rownames = "group") %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(-group), rescale) %>% 
  tail(4) %>% 
  select(1:10) %>% 
  ggradar::ggradar(fill = TRUE, fill.alpha = .2)
```



```{r}
peng %>% 
  filter(species == "Adelie") %>%
  select(island,contains(c("mm", "mass"))) %>% 
  rename(length = 2, depth = 3, flipper = 4, mass = 5) %>% 
  distinct(island, .keep_all = TRUE) %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(-island), rescale) %>% 
  ggradar(fill = TRUE, fill.alpha = .2, base.size = 10)+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("darkorange", "darkorchid", "cyan4"))

```
